synopsis.text: Cold and distant, Remi's estranged father returns home and shatters his world by revealing that Remi is adopted and selling him to a traveling musician, Vitalis. Heartbroken and alone, Remi embarks on a journey with Vitalis and his troupe of animal entertainers, facing the harsh realities of life as a traveling artist. Along the way, Remi meets a kind rich woman and her sick son, who are actually his real mother and brother, but he chooses to leave with Vitalis, unaware of the truth. Tragedies strike, leaving Remi alone with his faithful dog Capi, but he finds solace with a family of gardeners and their youngest mute daughter Lise. Torn between staying with the gardeners and traveling with his best friend Mattia, Remi searches for his place in the world. When he discovers that his real parents may be alive, Remi sets out on a perilous journey to London to find them, in this deeply moving story about friendship, loss, and the pursuit of happiness.
